name: Root Touch Up Spray for Medium Brown Hair by Style Edit | Gray Hair Coverage and Temporary Dye | 0.75 oz Travel Size
short_description: ROOT COVER UP SPRAY Style Edit’s spray that does it all - temporary root touch up spray instantly conceals unwanted grays or root re-growth, for salon worthy hair, every day! Unique long flat fan nozzle aims directly at targeted spots, allowing for precise application of our spray hair color - conceal what you want, where you want it.

MEDIUM BROWN HAIR SPRAY COLOR Patented formula has advanced color adaptive pigments and unique binding agents that smoothly adhere to the hair fiber and self-adjust to perfectly match hair color, providing a lustrous, natural shine with no sticky residue. Root Touch Up Medium Brown matches cool Brown, Brown and warm Brown hair shades, and is good for all hair types and textures. Even works as a root concealer for wigs!

ROOT CONCEALER SPRAY Travel size Premium Root Touch Up Spray is your secret weapon for at home or on-the-go, instantly giving you salon worthy hair! Applicator nozzle avoids spray mist getting into your eyes, staining your clothes or surroundings, and creating a mess on your vanity. Concealer spray is rain and sweat resistant, but washes out with your next shampoo.

GRAY HAIR COVERAGE Touch Up Spray extends the life of your color between salon visits, whether it’s about concealing gray roots or holding on to those beautiful highlights a little longer! Keep your roots and hairline intact whether you’re traveling, or just missing your salon appointment. Style Edit Root Touch Up Spray is paraben free, silicone free, has no harsh sulphates, and is ethically sourced.

STYLE EDIT brings together the world’s leading scientists and stylists to confront your most essential hair needs, and innovate products you can’t live without. We believe that gorgeous, healthy hair is a universal right – and not limited to your stylist’s chair! Our product range is dedicated to bringing the return of confidence and head-turning hair. With Style Edit, you’re never more than one product away from your best hair.

Waterproof, windproof and sweatproof: Sevich Hairline Powder has the industry's most durable formula that can last all day without fading. Small and portable: Sevich Hairline Powder includes a small mirror and a powder puff, which is convenient for applying and modifying your hairline while traveling or on the go. Safe and Gentle Formula: Our Sevich Hairline Powder is non-greasy, gentle on the scalp, and contains no harsh chemicals. It is safe for daily use, suitable for all skin types, and provides a comfortable and healthy solution for hair loss. name: Schwarzkopf Keratin Color Root Temporary Hair Color Spray, Medium Blonde, Instant Gray Coverage, Thicker, Fuller-Looking Roots, Easy-to-Use, No Ammonia, Low Mess Application, Scalp Friendly
short_description: Instant Root Refresh: Whether you're between colorings or need a last-minute touch-up, this 2-in-1 spray helps with up to 100% instant gray coverage and blends beautifully with your natural shade. It conceals roots with ease, no mixing, no mess

Thicker-Looking Roots in Seconds: This lightweight formula doesn’t just refresh color, it helps add visible fullness too. Designed to help cover thinning areas. It helps roots appear up to 37% thicker* for a fuller, voluminous look *vs untreated hair
Soft, Touchable Hair: This scalp-friendly formula dries quickly without leaving hair feeling stiff or sticky. You get coverage that feels as natural as it looks

Easy, Precise Spray with No Mess: Our color spray offers targeted control to cover roots or sparse areas exactly where you need it. No need to worry about staining your hands or counter, just shake, spray on clean dry hair, and go

Washes Out Easily: While it stays in place all day and resists smudging or transfer, it’s not permanent. One rinse with your regular shampoo & it’s gone, no residue or buildup. Formulated without Sulfates, Parabens, Phthalates, Ammonia, and Peroxide
product_description: Instant Root Coverage & Fuller-Looking Hair A quick fix that feels like a full refresh, Schwarzkopf Keratin Root 2-in-1 Temporary Color Spray in Dark Brown offers an instant solution to cover grays and add visible fullness at the roots. This lightweight spray blends seamlessly with medium to dark brown hair, giving natural-looking results that help you stretch time between permanent coloring sessions. Formulated with Keratin and Vitamin E, the non-sticky formula is gentle on your scalp and hair. It applies evenly, dries fast, and leaves no stiff or sticky residue behind. Perfect for touch-ups on the go or covering larger thinning areas, it’s easy to control with the precise spray nozzle, so you can apply color easily only where it’s needed. The result? Fuller-looking roots, natural tone-matching, and a clean, soft finish that lasts until your next shampoo. No need for mixing, no lengthy steps, just shake, spray, and enjoy refreshed hair with zero mess. One spray can delivers multiple uses depending on hair length and density. For all hair types and textures.

One application will last until your next shampoo, plus it’s free of ammonia and peroxide, and contains no synthetic dyes. Magic Root Cover Up is available in a palette of eight shades which can be used on black hair, brown hair, blonde hair and even red hair. Packaging may vary.
